subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: From 1928 to 2003, there were only six winners of the U.S. Open who were not American. But Australia’s Geoff Ogilvy, the 2006 winner, could be in the middle of a new trend.
snippet: From 1928 to 2003, there were only six winners of the U.S. Open who were not American. But Australia’s Geoff Ogilvy, the 2006 winner, could be in the middle of a new trend.
